text: Front-end developer who designs and codes beautiful and responsive websites and apps, specialising in JavaScript and React.
Back-end developer skills include building and testing back-end systems, including databases and APIs (MVC pattern).
UI Design experience creating new features for web apps and redesigning webpages, including building user flows, wireframes, prototypes and colour systems.
Worked with agile teams (product and development) to help deliver high-quality SaaS solutions in a tech company.
10 years prior experience in design before moving into development.
